[[File:E8661-Pattaya-water-vending-machines.jpg|thumb|Bottle-less drinking water vending machine in [[Pattaya]], Thailand. Customers bring their containers.]]
[[File:E8661-Pattaya-water-vending-machines.jpg|thumb|Bottle-less drinking water vending machine in [[Pattaya]], Thailand. Customers bring their containers.]]
A number of companies worldwide, among which are a number of North American supermarket chains, have [[vending machine]]s that dispense purified water into customer's own containers. This again obviates the costs and environmental issues involved in manufacturing, transporting, and disposing of plastic bottles.
